channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As political winds shift, top chipmaker TSMC looks beyond Taiwan
item.description: The lifeblood of Silicon Valley — advanced microchips — pumps from a science park on Taiwan's west coast, mostly from TSMC, the world's biggest chipma...

item.title: Afghan suspect in DC National Guard attack appeared to suffer personal crisis
item.description: Rahmanullah Lakanwal an Afghan national, is accused of shooting two National Guard soldiers on November 26. One of those soldiers, 20-year-old Sarah B...

item.title: From subways to galleries: Miami's Museum of Graffiti traces the appeal of street art
item.description: A new show at Miami's Museum of Graffiti traces the origins and development of street art. What began in the 1970s with teenagers tagging New York sub...

item.title: Fired worker sues government in a case that could upend civil rights laws
item.description: A fired immigration judge says she was dismissed from her job because of her gender, her status as a dual citizen of Lebanon and the fact that she onc...

item.title: After East Wing demolition, White House tours are back just in time for the holidays
item.description: For the first time in three months, the White House is reopening for public tours, just in time for the holidays.

item.title: White House says admiral ordered follow-on strike on alleged drug boat, insists attack was lawful
Yankee Candle maker Newell Brands to close stores and cut 900 jobs
item.description: Newell Brands shares have sunk nearly 62% this year as the consumer products giant grapples with slowing growth.

item.title: Democrats begin congressional probe of Kash Patel's use of FBI Gulfstream jet
item.description: House Democrats allege Patel has used the FBI's Gulfstream jet for a "date night" in Tennessee and an outing with friends in Texas.

item.title: Appeals court disqualifies ex-Trump lawyer Alina Habba as New Jersey prosecutor
item.description: An appeals court disqualified Alina Habba, Trump's former personal attorney, from serving as US Attorney for New Jersey.

item.title: Heavy snow predicted for Northeast as Midwest still struggles with Thanksgiving weather snarls
item.description: Black ice, snow showers and fog are pestering post-holiday travelers in the Midwest, while the Northeast is gearing up for its first major snowstorm o...

item.title: South African radio DJ among five charged over Russia recruitment plot
item.description: The group has been charged under a law which prohibits people from joining foreign armies.

item.title: What we know about the vetting process of the National Guard shooting suspect
item.description: The shooting raised questions about whether the government missed any red flags about the alleged attacker, 29-year-old Afghan national Rahmanullah La...

item.title: Is the US preparing for war with Venezuela?
item.description: BBC Verify has tracked US assets in the Caribbean Sea, after military strikes on suspected Venezuelan drug boats.

item.title: Kids with smartphones by age 12 are at higher risk of health issues, study finds
item.description: Children and adolescents who own smartphones by age 12 have higher risks of depression, poor sleep and obesity, according to a new study.

item.title: Three children among four killed in shooting at children's birthday party in California
item.description: Officials say 11 others are injured in what they believe is a "targeted" shooting at a children's birthday party.

item.title: National Guard member shot in DC has shown positive signs, West Virginia governor says
Zelensky says Ukraine territory 'most difficult' issue, as US envoy prepares to meet Putin
item.description: US envoy Steve Witkoff and Donald Trump's adviser and son-in-law Jared Kushner will meet Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

item.title: Gas prices dip below $3 per gallon, the lowest since 2021
item.description: The average price across the U.S. now stands at $2.95 per gallon, down 8.5 cents from a week ago, according to GasBuddy.
